member.name: M:MultiTenant.EntityFrameworkCore.MultiProviders.RegisterDI.AddMultiTenantEntityFrameworkCore``3(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.String)
member.typeparam: DbContext which will be multi tenant
